maqras.text: U pravi chas, my vyrobymo dlya nykh vytvir, zroblenyy earthly materialiv, zayavlyayuchy shcho lyudy ye ne pevni pro nashi vidkryttya
denʹ prybude koly my sklykayemo z kozhnoyi spilʹnoty deyakoyi z tsykh khto ne viryv v nashym dokazam, forcibly
Koly vony prybuvayutʹ, Vin skazhe, "Vy vidkhylyly Moyi vidkryttya, pered tym yak nabuvaty znannya pro nykh. Tsi ne yaki vy
Vony zaznayutʹ requital dlya yikhnʹoho wickedness; vony nichoho ne skazhutʹ
vony ne pobachyly shcho my zrobyly nich dlya yikhnʹoho vidpochynku, ta denʹ osvityly? Tsey povynni buty dostatni dokazy dlya lyudey shcho vvazhayutʹ
Na dni koly rih duyetʹsya, kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli bude horrified, krim tsykh vybranoyi BOHOM. Vesʹ prybude pered tym, yak Yo, forcibly
Koly vy dyvytesʹ na hory, vy dumayete shcho vony stoyatʹ dosi. Ale vony vyhlyadayutʹ zvorushlyvi, yak khmary. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vyrobnytstvo BOHA, khto perfected vse. Vin tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
Tsey khto prynosyatʹ harni pratsi (u yikhnikh zapysakh) otrymaye daleki krashchi vynahorody, ta vony budutʹ doskonalo zabezpechuyutʹ z zhakhu toho dnya
Yak dlya tsykh khto prynosyatʹ zlo pratsi, vony budutʹ prymushuvatysya u Peklo. Vy ne pryyizhdzhayete requited za shcho vy
ya prosto nakazuyusʹ shchob obozhnyuvaty Lorda tsʹoho mista - Vin vstyh bezpechnyy sanctuary - ta Vin volodiye vsima rechamy. YA nakazuyusʹ shchob buty submitter
Ta shchob deklamuvaty Quran. Whoever keruyetʹsya keruyetʹsya dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy, ta yakshcho vony zablukayutʹsya, todi kazhutʹ, "ya ye prosto warner
Ta kazhutʹ, "Pokhvala musytʹ BOH; Vin pokazhe vam Yoho dokazy, do vy vyznayete yikh. Vash Lord nikoly unaware budʹ shcho vy
M
Tsey (lysty) utvoryuyutʹ dokazy tsiyeyi hlybokoyi knyhy
My deklamuyemo do vas herein deyaka istoriya Moses ta Pharaoh, pravdyvo, na blaho lyudey shcho vvazhayutʹ

Pharaoh povernuvsya u tyrana na zemli, ta dyskryminuvav deyakykh lyudey. Vin peresliduvav bezporadnu hrupu z nykh, ubyvayuchy yikhnikh syniv, toy chas, yak ekonomyvshy yikhnikh dochok. Vin buv diysno bezputnyy
My willed kompensuvaty tsym khto buly pryhnichenyy na zemli, ta shchob povernuty yikh u lideriv, ta robymo yim inheritors
Ta shchob vstanovyty yikh na zemli, ta shchob daty Pharaoh, Hamaan, ta yikhniy viysʹko smak yikhnʹoyi vlasnoyi medytsyny
My nadykhnuly Moses' maty: "Medsestra yo, ta koly vy bo dlya yoho zhyttya, kydayete yoho u richku bez strakha abo horya. My povernemo yomu do vas, ta zrobyte yomu odnomu z kur'yeriv
Pharaoh rodyna zibrala yoho, tilʹky maty yoho vedutʹ opozytsiyu ta shchob buty dzherelo horya dlya nykh. Shcho tomu, shcho Pharaoh, Hamaan, ta yikhniy viysʹko porushnyky

Pharaoh druzhyna skazala, "Tse mozhe buty joyous znakhodyte dlya mene ta vy. Ne ubyyte yoho, dlya vin mozhe buty deyakoyi vyhody dlya nas, abo my mozhemo pryynyaty yoho buty nash syn." Vony ne maly ideyi
rozum Moses' maty rosla tak tryvozhna shcho vona mayzhe viddala yoho identychnistʹ. Ale my posylyly yiyi sertse, shchob zrobyty yiy viruyuchyy
Vona skazala yoho sestri, "Prostezhuyutʹ yoho shlyakh." Vona sposterihala yoho zdaleku, v toy chas, yak vony ne spryynyaly
